TopicTitle: KSP Parody to "This is what it feels like" Lyrics

Articles.Content:
Quick little editing I did.

Song based off the view of a Kerbal astronaut watching as Kerbin is devastated by all out nuclear warfare.

Nobody here going to pick me up

I see flashes on the ground and the cities are down

No control talking on my radio now

Oh how I'll miss such a beautiful sound
